item.title: Computational Models of Natural Argument Workshop (CMNA'19)
item.description: I’m delighted to let everyone know that the 19th edition of the Workshop on Computational Models of Natural Argument will be hosted as part of the PERSUASIVE conference this year. Dr Wells, along with Jodi Schneider of the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, is one of the new members of the steering committee and joins long-standing committee members, Floriana Grasso of the University of Liverpool and Nancy Green of the University of North Carolina Greensboro.
